name: Flappy Action - Gravitational Arcade Shoot 'em up
name_original: Flappy Action - Gravitational Arcade Shoot 'em up
description:
Flappy Action is a mobile Arcade Shoot 'em up where you are constantly being affected by Gravity, You will need to make sure that you don't fall over!

PC - Controls:

ZShootXJump

That's all.
